text: Abdallah Omar Kigoda (25 November 1953 â€“ 12 October 2015) was a Tanzanian CCM politician and Member of Parliament for Handeni constituency. He served from 1995 to 2015. He served as the Minister of Industry and Trade. Kigoda died on 12 October 2015 while undergoing treatment in India for cancer, aged 61.Waziri Kigoda afariki dunia nchini India , Mwananchi ==References== Category:1953 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Tanzanian politicians
